:py:mod:`utilities`
===================

.. py:module:: utilities

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Collection of helper functions.



Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   utilities.check_columns



.. py:function:: check_columns(expected_cols: List[str], data: pandas.DataFrame)

   Check if a list of given columns exist in a given Pandas dataframe.

   :param expected_cols: list of columns to check
   :type expected_cols: List[str]
   :param df: pandas dataframe to check
   :type df: pd.DataFrame

   :raises ValueError: if any of the expected columns are missing.
